column5: Opens this Saturday.....or next???  TNX  Meely

This Saturday... Im going to venture out this year and try to catch some Musky (to pacify myself until I can legally fish for Bass)  WHat kind of rigs are you using?  Bait, rods, reels, ect?  I have never done it before, so any help for this poor noob is greatly appreciated.   Thanks in advance!

Ok, so the baits I mainly have a handle on then..  What about Rods - Length, stiffness?  I assume the Shimano curado I have will work...  How heavy should the line be? Is there a leader necessary?  Thanks!
